article_title: Richmond Times-Dispatch: Political Commentary From Jeff Schapiro

og.description: Gov. Terry McAuliffe is trying a different approach: He's attempting to speak the Republicans' language - at the expense of irritating the Democratic left.
og.title: Schapiro: McAuliffe offering GOP a trade - tax cuts for health care?
